TITLE: Installing ECharts with NPM
DESCRIPTION: This command installs the ECharts library as a project dependency using npm. The `--save` flag ensures that ECharts is added to the project's `package.json` file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/echarts/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
npm install echarts --save
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing NPM Dependencies
DESCRIPTION: This command installs all the dependencies required for building ECharts from the `package.json` file. It's a prerequisite for building the library from source.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/echarts/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# Install the dependencies from NPM:
npm install
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building ECharts for Production
DESCRIPTION: This command builds the ECharts source code for production, generating optimized files in the `dist` directory.  This includes all types of "production" files.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/echarts/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# If intending to build and get all types of the "production" files:
npm run release
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Checking TypeScript Code
DESCRIPTION: This command checks the correctness of the TypeScript code within the ECharts project. This ensures type safety and helps prevent errors during development.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/echarts/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# Check the correctness of TypeScript code.
npm run checktype
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including Baidu Maps Extension via Script Tags
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to include the Baidu Maps extension by directly referencing the necessary JavaScript files in an HTML document. It requires a Baidu Maps API key (`ak`) obtained from the Baidu Maps developer platform.  ECharts and the bmap extension script must be included after the Baidu Maps API.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/echarts/blob/master/extension-src/bmap/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<!-- 引入百度地图的 JS SDK，这里需要使用你在百度地图开发者平台申请的 ak -->
<!-- 如需使用百度地图 2.0 版本，请将 `v=3.0` 改为 `v=2.0` -->
<script src="https://api.map.baidu.com/api?v=3.0&ak="></script>
<!-- 引入 ECharts -->
<script src="dist/echarts.min.js"></script>
<!-- 引入百度地图扩展 -->
<script src="dist/extension/bmap.min.js"></script>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Including Baidu Maps Extension via Webpack
DESCRIPTION: This snippet shows how to include the Baidu Maps extension when using a module bundler like Webpack. It requires the `echarts` and `echarts/extension/bmap/bmap` modules to be installed as dependencies in the project.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/echarts/blob/master/extension-src/bmap/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
require('echarts');
require('echarts/extension/bmap/bmap');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring ECharts with Baidu Maps
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates the basic configuration of an ECharts option to use the Baidu Maps extension. It involves defining the `bmap` component within the `option` object, setting parameters like center coordinates, zoom level, and other map-related settings.  It also includes a scatter series using the 'bmap' coordinate system.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/echarts/blob/master/extension-src/bmap/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
option = {
    // 加载 bmap 组件
    bmap: {
        // 百度地图中心经纬度。默认为 [104.114129, 37.550339]。
        center: [120.13066322374, 30.240018034923],
        // 百度地图缩放级别。默认为 5。
        zoom: 14,
        // 是否开启拖拽缩放，可以只设置 'scale' 或者 'move'。默认关闭。
        roam: true,
        // 百度地图的旧版自定义样式，见 https://lbsyun.baidu.com/custom/index.htm
        mapStyle: {},
        // 百度地图 3.0 之后的新版自定义样式，见 https://lbsyun.baidu.com/index.php?title=open/custom
        mapStyleV2: {},
        // 百度地图的初始化配置，见 https://lbsyun.baidu.com/cms/jsapi/reference/jsapi_reference.html#a0b1
        mapOptions: {
            // 禁用百度地图自带的底图可点功能
            enableMapClick: false
        }
    },
    series: [{
        type: 'scatter',
        // 使用百度地图坐标系
        coordinateSystem: 'bmap',
        // 数据格式跟在 geo 坐标系上一样，每一项都是 [经度，纬度，数值大小，其它维度...]
        data: [ [120, 30, 1] ],
        // 编码数据项中第三个元素作为 value 维度
        encode: {
            value: 2
        }
    }]
}

// 获取百度地图实例，使用百度地图自带的控件
var bmap = chart.getModel().getComponent('bmap').getBMap();
bmap.addControl(new BMap.MapTypeControl());
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Building ECharts in Development Mode
DESCRIPTION: This command rebuilds the ECharts source code immediately in watch mode when changes are made. It also opens the `./test` directory, allowing you to view test cases. Run `npm run mktest:help` to learn more about creating test cases.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/echarts/blob/master/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: Shell
CODE:
```
# Rebuild source code immediately in watch mode when changing the source code.
# It opens the `./test` directory, and you may open `-cases.html` to get the list
# of all test cases.
# If you wish to create a test case, run `npm run mktest:help` to learn more.
npm run dev
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Build ECharts for Testing
DESCRIPTION: This snippet outlines the steps to build the `echarts.js` file from the current source code. It navigates to the `build` directory, installs necessary npm packages, and executes the build script to generate the `echarts.js` file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/echarts/blob/master/test/README.md#_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd ../build
npm install
node build.js
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Download Last Release ECharts
DESCRIPTION: This snippet configures the testing environment by downloading the `echarts.js` file from the last release. It navigates to the `test/ut` directory and executes the `configure` script to download and store the `echarts.js` file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/echarts/blob/master/test/README.md#_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
cd ../test/ut
./configure
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Compare ECharts with Specific Release
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to compare the current version of ECharts with a specific release based on its hash code. It executes the `configure` script with the hash code as an argument, comparing the current `/dist/echarts.js` with that of the specified release.
SOURCE: https://github.com/apache/echarts/blob/master/test/README.md#_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
# this compares current `/dist/echarts.js` with that of v3.1.6
./configure 3724a16
```
